Title: Egyptian Koshari
Ingredients: 1 cup dried chickpeas (or 2 - 15 ounce cans of chickpeas)** See note 3
½ bag of 1 lb elbow pasta
2 cups dry Calrose rice (or short-grain rice) **See note 4
8 whole tomatoes (about 2 lbs or 1 kg in weight)
1 bell pepper (size of a clenched fist)
oil for frying (preferably sunflower oil)** See note 5
flour (to toss the onions in prior to frying)
Instructions: Soak dry lentils and dry chickpeas ahead of time

Title: Mac and Cheese
Instructions: Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water for 8 minutes.
Add Cheddar cheese and stir until melted, 2 to 4 minutes.
Drain macaroni and fold into cheese sauce until coated.
